title: Set bitbucket build status for default and release branch builds

content.raw:
We currently set the bitbucket build status for the `ci-pr_any` builds, but it would be nice to have it for the default and release branch builds, so we can browse recent jenkins builds from the commit view in bitbucket.

For example, `ign-math` has lots of build status because it has pipelines and appveyor testing enabled:

* https://bitbucket.org/ignitionrobotics/ign-math/commits/branch/ign-math3

but `ign-msgs` only has jenkins builds enabled:

* https://bitbucket.org/ignitionrobotics/ign-msgs/commits/branch/default
